Verses: 1 ekoniyaa Ennum Raajaavum, Raajasthreeyum, Pradhaanigalum, Yoodhaavilum Erusalemilumulla Prabukkalum, Thachcharum, Kollarum Erusalemaivittup Purappattuppona Pirpaadu,

2 eremiyaa Theerkkadharisi Siraippattuppona Mooppargalil Meedhiyaanavargalukkum, Aasaariyargalukkum, Theerkkadharisigalukkum, Nebugaadhnechchaar Siraippaduththi Erusalemilirundhu Baabilonukkuk Kondupona Sagala Janangalukkum Ezhudhi,

3 yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Sidhekkiyaa Baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaaridaththil Kodukkumpadi Saappaanin Kumaaranaagiya Eleyaasaarin Kaiyilum, Ilkkiyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Kemariyaavin Kaiyilum Koduththu, Erusalemilirundhu Baabilonukku Anuppina Nirubaththin Vibaram:
4 isravelin Dhevanaagiya Senaigalin Karththar, Thaam Erusalemilirundhu Baabilonukku Siraippattuppogappannina Anaivarukkum Arivikkiradhu Ennavendraal,
5 neengal Veedugalaik Katti, Kudiyirundhu, Thottangalai Naatti, Avaigalin Kaniyai Saappidungal.

6 neengal Pengalai Vivaagampanni, Kumaararaiyum Kumaaraththigalaiyum Petru, Ungal Kumaararukkup Pengalaikkondu, Ungal Kumaaraththigalaip Purusharukkuk Kodungal; Ivargalum Kumaararaiyum Kumaaraththigalaiyum Perattum; Neengal Ange Kurugaamal Perugi,
7 naan Ungalai Siraippattuppogappannina Pattanaththin Samaadhaanaththaith Thedi, Adharkaagak Karththarai Vinnappampannungal; Adharku Samaadhaanamirukkaiyil Ungalukkum Samaadhaanamirukkum.

8 melum, Ungal Naduvilirukkira Ungal Theerkkadharisigalum Ungal Kurikaararum Ungalai Mosampokkavottaadhirungal; Soppanam Kaanappannugira Ungal Soppanakkaararukku Sevikodaamalum Irungal Endru Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.
9 avargal En Naamaththai Solli Ungalukkup Poiyaana Theerkkadharisanam Uraikkiraargal; Naan Avargalai Anuppinadhillai Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

10 baabilonile Ezhubadhuvarusham Niraiverinapinbu Naan Ungalai Sandhiththu, Ungalai Ivvidaththukkuth Thirumbivarappannumpadikku Ungalmel En Nalvaarththaiyai Niraiverappannuven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

11 neengal Edhirpaarththirukkum Mudivai Ungalukku Kodukkumpadikku Naan Ungalperil Ninaiththirukkira Ninaivugalai Ariven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Avaigal Theemaikkalla, Samaadhaanaththukkedhuvaana Ninaivugale.
12 appozhudhu Neengal Koodivandhu, Ennaith Thozhudhukondu Ennai Nokki Vinnappampannuveergal; Naan Ungalukku Sevikoduppen.
13 ungal Muzhu Irudhayaththodum Ennaith Thedineergalaanaal, Ennaith Thedugaiyil Kandupidippeergal.

14 naan Ungalukkuk Kaanappaduven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Naan Ungal Siraiyiruppaith Thiruppi Naan Ungalaith Thuraththivitta Ellaa Jaadhigalilum Ellaa Idangalilumirundhu Ungalai Serththu, Naan Ungalai Vilakkiyirundha Sthalaththukke Ungalaith Thirumbivarappannuven Endru Karththarsollugiraar.
15 karththar Engalukku Baabilonilum Theerkkadharisigalai Ezhuppinaar Endru Sollugireergal.

16 aanaal Dhaaveedhin Singaasanaththil Utkaarndhirukkira Raajaavaikkuriththum Ungalodekooda Siraiyiruppil Purappattuppogaamal Indha Nagaraththil Kudiyirukkira Ungal Sagodhararaagiya Ellaa Janangalaikkuriththum,

17 idho, Naan Pattayaththaiyum, Panjaththaiyum, Kollainoyaiyum Avargalukkul Anuppuven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Pusikkaththagaadha Kettuppona Aththippazhangalukku Avargalai Oppaakkuven Endru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.

18 avargal En Vaarththaigalaik Kelaamarponapadiyaal, Naan Avargalaip Pattayaththaalum, Panjaththaalum Kollainoyaalum Pinthodarndhu, Avargalai Boomiyilulla Ellaa Raajyangalilum Alaindhu Thirigiravargalaagavum, Naan Avargalaith Thuraththugira Ellaa Jaadhigalidaththilum Saabamaagavum, Paazhaagavum, Eesalidudhalukkidamaagavum, Nindhaiyaagavum Vaippen Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
19 naan Ungalidaththirkuth Theerkkadharisigalaagiya En Oozhiyakkaararai Erkanave Anuppikkondeyirundhum, Neengal Sevikodaamarponeergale Endru Karththarsollugiraar.
20 ippodhum Siraiyirukkumpadi Naan Erusalemilirundhu Baabilonukku Anuppivitta Neengalellaarum Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyaik Kelungal.

21 en Naamaththai Solli Ungalukkup Poiyaana Theerkkadharisanam Uraikkira Kolaayaavin Kumaaranaagiya Aagaabaiyum, Maaseyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Sidhekkiyaavaiyunkuriththu: Idho, Naan Avargalai Baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaarin Kaiyile Oppukkodukkiren, Avan Avargalai Ungal Kangalukku Munbaagak Kondrupoduvaan.

22 baabilon Raajaa Akkiniyinaal Suttuppotta Sidhekkiyaavukkum Aagaabukkum Karththar Unnai Samaanamaakkakkadavarendru, Avargalaik Kuriththu Oru Saabavaarththai Baabilonile Siraiyirukkira Yoodhaa Anaivarukkullum Vazhangum Endru Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.

23 avargal Isravelile Madhiketta Kaariyaththai Seydhu Thangal Ayalaarudaiya Penjaadhigalode Vibasaarampanni, Naan Avargalukkuk Karpiyaadha Poiyaana Vaarththaiyai En Naamaththai Solli Uraiththaargal; Naan Adhai Ariven; Adharku Naane Saatchi Endru Karththar Uraikkiraar Endru Ezhudhinaan.
24 pinnum Karththar Ennai Nokki: Nee Nekelaamiyanaagiya Semaayaavukkum Solliyanuppavendiyadhu Ennavendraal:

25 nee Erusalemilirukkira Ellaa Janangalukkum Maaseyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Seppaniyaa Ennum Aasaariyanukkum, Matra Aasaariyargalukkum Un Naamaththile Nirubaththai Ezhudhiyanuppinadhu Ennavendru Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.

26 ivanukku Avan Ezhudhiyirundha Nirubamaavadhu: Neengal Karththarudaiya Aalayaththin Visaarippukkaararaayirukkumpadikkum, Bramaikondu Thannaith Theerkkadharisiyaakkikkolgiravanaagiya Endha Manushanaiyum Neer Kaavalaraiyilum Thozhuvilum Podumpadikkum, Karththar Ummai Aasaariyanaayirundha Yoidhaavin Sthaanaththile Aasaariyanaaga Vaiththaare.
27 ippodhum Ungalukkuth Theerkkadharisanam Koorivarugira Aanadhodh Ooraanaagiya Eremiyaavai Neer Kadindhukollaamarponadhenna?

28 indha Siraiyiruppu Nedunkaalamaaga Irukkum; Neengal Veedugalaikkatti, Avaigalil Kudiyirundhu, Thottangalai Naatti, Avaigalin Kanigalai Saappidungal Endru Baabilonilirukkira Engalukku Solliyanuppinaanendru Ezhudhiyirundhaan.
29 indha Nirubaththai Seppaniyaa Engira Aasaariyan Eremiyaa Theerkkadharisiyin Kaadhugal Ketka Vaasiththaan.
30 aadhalaal Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Eremiyaavukku Undaagi Avar:

31 siraiyirukkira Anaivarukkum Nee Solliyanuppavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Nekelaamiyanaagiya Semaayaavaikkuriththu, Karththar: Semaayaavai Naan Anuppaadhirundhum, Avan Ungalukkuth Theerkkadharisanancholli, Ungalaip Poiyai Nambappannugirapadiyinaal,

32 idho, Naan Nekelaamiyanaagiya Semaayaavaiyum, Avan Sandhadhiyaiyum Dhandippen; Indha Janaththin Naduvile Kudiyiruppavan Oruvanum Avanukku Illaadhiruppaan; Naan En Janaththukku Seyyum Nanmaiyai Avan Kaanbadhillai Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Karththarukku Virodhamaaik Kalagamundaagap Pesinaan Endru Karththar Sollugiraar Endru Sol Endraar.
